format.name: PlaceholderCountChecker
format.description: The argument value must contain at least 5 placeholders, each enclosed in square brackets (e.g., [address]).

fn_schema.name: schedule_social_media_posts
fn_schema.description: Schedules social media posts across multiple platforms.

post_content.description: The content of the social media post including text, hashtags, and mentions. The argument value must contain at least 5 placeholders, each enclosed in square brackets (e.g., [address]).

scheduled_time.description: The ISO 8601 formatted date and time when the post should be published.

platforms.description: List of social media platforms where the post should be published.

items.description: Name of the social media platform.

The post should read: "Excited to unveil our latest innovation! ðŸš€ Check out our new product dropping soon. #ProductLaunch #Innovation @OurBrand". Please make sure it goes out at the exact time I specified across all the selected platforms. Thank you!

Could you help me organize my company's social media rollout for tomorrow? I need to post the following message on LinkedIn and Facebook: "Building a brighter future together! Join us for our sustainability webinar next week. Register now: [link] #Sustainability #Webinar @CompanyName". Please have this scheduled to publish at 8:30 AM on June 12, 2024, in ISO 8601 format, preferably matching 2024-06-12T08:30:00Z. Let me know once it's set up on both platforms.

I want to queue up a special post for Instagram only. Can you schedule the following content to go out on July 4th, 2024, at 17:00 UTC? The post should announce our holiday sale: "Stars, stripes, and savings! Enjoy 20% off all items this Independence Day. Shop now and celebrate with us! #July4th #Sale @yourbrand". Please ensure it's formatted properly for Instagram and posted exactly at the specified date and time.

I'm looking to pre-schedule a promotional message across all my social media platforms for maximum reach. The content should say: "Don't miss our midnight madness event starting tonight! Exclusive deals and surprises await you. For updates, follow us here. #MidnightMadness #Deals @ourshop". I need this to be posted on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and LinkedIn right at midnight, which is 2024-06-30T00:00:00Z. Please set this up to publish simultaneously across all those channels.

Could you please help me schedule a post for my professional network? I'd like the following message to be published on LinkedIn on August 1st, 2024, at 9:00 AM UTC: "Proud to announce our team's achievement in securing the top award at the industry conference! Thanks to everyone for your support. #Teamwork #Success @ourcompany". Please make sure it is set to go out at the specified time and only on LinkedIn.
